Song.title: Praise God
Song.copyright: Lyrics by Thomas Ken and Isaac Watts Alt. lyrics by Bob Kauflin Music arr. by Bob Kauflin © 2000 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D2 | G/D | D2 | G/D | D2 | G/D | D2 | G/D | G2/D]
Verse 1: Praise [D2]God from whom all blessings flow In [G2]heaven above and earth below [Em7] Praise [Bm7]God the Father and the Son [D/A] Praise [G2]God the Spirit, three in one [Em7sus4 | Em7sus4 |]
[D2 | D2 | G2 | G2 | Bm7sus | Bm7sus4 | Asus4 | Asus4]
Verse 2: [G]From [D2]all that dwell beneath the skies [G2 | G2 |] Let [Bm7]the Creator’s praise arise [C2 | C2 |] Let [G2]our Redeemer’s name be sung [Bm7 | Bm7 |] Thro[6/4 |]ugh [G]every [Em]land, by [Asus]ev’[A]ry [4/4 |][C2 (to bridge)]tongue
Bridge: [| G2 | C2 | Dsus D | C2 | G A2 | F G | A | A |]
{key:E} Verse 3: E[E2]ternal are Your [A]mer[B]cies, [E2]Lord E[A2]ternal truth at[F#m]tends [A2]Your [B2]Word Your [C#m]praise will sound from [C#m]shore [B]to [A2 | B/A | A2 | G]shore Till [F#m7]suns shall rise a[2/4 |]nd [D2]set [4/4 |]no [E2 (to tag)]more
Tag: [| E2 | A2 | A2 | C#m7 | C#m7 | B7sus | A G D/F# | E2]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 praise god from whom all blessings flow in heaven above and earth below praise god the father and the son praise god the spirit three in one verse 2 from all that dwell beneath the skies let the creators praise arise let our redeemers name be sung through every land by evry tongue bridge verse 3 eternal are your mercies lord eternal truth attends your word your praise will sound from shore to shore till suns shall rise and set no more tag
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D2 | G/D | D2 | G/D | D2 | G/D | D2 | G/D | G2/D]
Verse 1: Praise [D2]God from whom all blessings flow In [G2]heaven above and earth below [Em7] Praise [Bm7]God the Father and the Son [D/A] Praise [G2]God the Spirit, three in one [Em7sus4 | Em7sus4 |]
Nicene 1: [G2]We believe in one God, the Father, the Almi[Bm7sus]ghty, maker of [Bm7sus]heaven and earth, of all [Asus4]that is, seen and unseen.
Verse 1: Praise [D2]God from whom all blessings flow In [G2]heaven above and earth below [Em7] Praise [Bm7]God the Father and the Son [D/A] Praise [G2]God the Spirit, three in one [Em7sus4 | Em7sus4 |]
{new_page} Nicene 2: [D2]We believe in one Lord, Jesus Christ, [D2]the only son of God, [G2]eternally begotten of the Father, God from God, [Bm7sus]Light from Light, [Bm7sus]true God from true God, [Asus4]begotten, not made, [Asus4]of one being with the Father. [D2]Through him all things were made. [G2]For us and for our salvation [G2]he came down from heaven; [Bm7sus]by the power of the Holy Spirit he became incarnate from the [Asus4]Virgin Mary, [Asus4]and was made man. For our [D2]sake he was crucified under Pontius Pilate; he suffered [G2]death and was buried. [G2]On the third day he rose again [Bm7sus]in accordance with the Scriptures; [Bm7sus]he ascended into heaven and is [Asus4]seated at the right hand of the Father. He will come again in [D2]glory to judge the living and the [G2]dead, and his kingdom will have no [Bm7sus]end. [Asus4 | Asus4]
{new_page} Verse 2: [G]From [D2]all that dwell beneath the skies [G2 | G2 |] Let [Bm7]the Creator’s praise arise [C2 | C2 |] Let [G2]our Redeemer’s name be sung [Bm7 | Bm7 |] Thro[6/4 |]ugh [G]every [Em]land, by [Asus]ev’[A]ry [4/4 |] [ C2 | C2]tongue
Nicene 3: [D2]We believe in the Holy Spirit, the Lord, the giver of life, [G2]who proceeds from the Father and the Son. With the [Bm7]Father and the Son he is [Bm7]worshipped and glorified. [Asus]He has spoken through the Prophets.
[D2]We believe in one holy catholic and apostolic Church. [G2]We acknowledge one baptism for the forgiveness of sins. We look for the [Bm7]resurrection of the dead, and the life of the world to [Asus]come. [(key change) Bsus]AMEN.
{key:E} Verse 3: E[E2]ternal are Your [A]mer[B]cies, [E2]Lord E[A2]ternal truth at[F#m]tends [A2]Your [B2]Word Your [C#m]praise will sound from [C#m]shore [B]to [A2 | B/A | A2 | G]shore Till [F#m7]suns shall rise a[2/4 |]nd [D2]set [4/4 |]no [E2 (to tag)]more
Tag: [| E2 | A2 | A2 | C#m7 | C#m7 | B7sus | A G D/F# | E2]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 praise god from whom all blessings flow in heaven above and earth below praise god the father and the son praise god the spirit three in one nicene 1 we believe in one god the father the almighty maker of heaven and earth of all that is seen and unseen verse 1 praise god from whom all blessings flow in heaven above and earth below praise god the father and the son praise god the spirit three in one nicene 2 we believe in one lord jesus christ the only son of god eternally begotten of the father god from god light from light true god from true god begotten not made of one being with the father through him all things were made for us and for our salvation he came down from heaven by the power of the holy spirit he became incarnate from the virgin mary and was made man for our sake he was crucified under pontius pilate he suffered death and was buried on the third day he rose again in accordance with the scriptures he ascended into heaven and is seated at the right hand of the father he will come again in glory to judge the living and the dead and his kingdom will have no end verse 2 from all that dwell beneath the skies let the creators praise arise let our redeemers name be sung through every land by evry tongue nicene 3 we believe in the holy spirit the lord the giver of life who proceeds from the father and the son with the father and the son he is worshipped and glorified he has spoken through the prophets we believe in one holy catholic and apostolic church we acknowledge one baptism for the forgiveness of sins we look for the resurrection of the dead and the life of the world to come amen verse 3 eternal are your mercies lord eternal truth attends your word your praise will sound from shore to shore till suns shall rise and set no more tag
Arrangement.album: Upward: The Bob Kauflin Hymns Project

Arrangement.description: Verse 1 and 3 only (no intro, no interlude
Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Praise [D2]God from whom all blessings flow In [G2]heaven above and earth below [Em7] Praise [Bm7]God the Father and the Son [D/A] Praise [G2]God the Spirit, three in one [Em7sus4 | Bsus B |]
{key:E} Verse 3: E[E2]ternal are Your [A]mer[B]cies, [E2]Lord E[A2]ternal truth at[F#m]tends [A2]Your [B2]Word Your [C#m]praise will sound from [C#m]shore [B]to [A2 | B/A | A2 | G]shore Till [F#m7]suns shall rise a[2/4 |]nd [D2]set [4/4 |]no [E2 (to tag)]more
End: [| E2 | A2 | A2 | C#m7 | C#m7 | B7sus | A G D/F# | E2]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 praise god from whom all blessings flow in heaven above and earth below praise god the father and the son praise god the spirit three in one verse 3 eternal are your mercies lord eternal truth attends your word your praise will sound from shore to shore till suns shall rise and set no more end
